CreateAttributeGroup.description: Grants permission to create an attribute group

CreateProduct.description: Grants permission to create a product and that product's first provisioning artifact

CreateTagOption.name: CreateTagOption
CreateTagOption.description: Grants permission to create a TagOption

DeleteProvisionedProductPlan.description: Grants permission to delete a provisioned product plan

DeleteServiceAction.name: DeleteServiceAction
